ai-patthana15.17:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously:
ai-patthana15.17:1.1_0: You don’t have the cause or condition for the reason for the teaching.
ai-patthana15.17:2.1_0: ‘The cause and condition that gives rise to the reason for the arising of the teaching.’
